Text: my apologies to all. my internet connection died and my isp didn't fix it for weeks... at any rate, I'm finally back, and still seeding this.

Ever so thankful, dude! I missed out on this show when it was new and cool, so I'm doing this intense.

A little bird whispered in my ear though, that the 1GB version of season 4 is with 25-minute episodes, and not the original 30-minute ones. They cut them down for japanese release or something... Is that correct?
This does NOT appear to be the Japanese version, but I've only watched the intro to one episode.
These do not appear to be cut. They all run well over 25 minutes. From 26:25 to 28:42.
